Shape: Objects with different shapes can also be differentiated. For example, a round ball can be differentiated from a square box.
Size: Objects of different sizes can be differentiated. For example, a small apple can be differentiated from a large orange.
Position: Objects in different positions can be differentiated. For example, an apple on a table can be differentiated from an orange on a table.
Function: Objects with different functions can be differentiated. For example, a chair for sitting can be differentiated from a table for holding things.
Material: Objects made of different materials can be differentiated. For example, a wooden chair can be differentiated from a metal chair.
